name: SpaceX Starship Landing Pad
description: This is the landing pad used for early Starship development flights.

location.name: SpaceX Starbase, TX, USA
location.description: Starbase is an industrial complex for Starship rockets and the headquarters of the American aerospace manufacturer company SpaceX. Located near Brownsville, Texas, United States, it has been under construction since the late 2010s by SpaceX. Starbase is composed of a spaceport near the Gulf of Mexico, a production facility at the Boca Chica village, and a small structure test site along the Texas State Highway 4.
